verses.verse: But it came to pass within a while after <WH3117>, in the time <WH3117> of wheat <WH2406> harvest <WH7105>, that SHimshon <WH8123> visited <WH6485> <WH8799> his wife <WH802> with a kid <WH1423> <WH5795>; and he said <WH559> <WH8799>, I will go in <WH935> <WH8799> to my wife <WH802> into the chamber <WH2315>. But her father <WH1> would not suffer <WH5414> <WH8804> him to go in <WH935> <WH8800>.

And her father <WH1> said <WH559> <WH8799>, I verily <WH559> <WH8800> thought <WH559> <WH8804> that thou hadst utterly <WH8130> <WH8800> hated <WH8130> <WH8804> her; therefore I gave <WH5414> <WH8799> her to thy companion <WH4828>: is not her younger <WH6996> sister <WH269> fairer <WH2896> than she? take her, I pray thee, instead of her.

And SHimshon <WH8123> said <WH559> <WH8799> concerning them, Now <WH6471> shall I be more blameless <WH5352> <WH8738> than the Philistines <WH6430>, though I do <WH6213> <WH8802> them a displeasure <WH7451>.

And SHimshon <WH8123> went <WH3212> <WH8799> and caught <WH3920> <WH8799> three <WH7969> hundred <WH3967> foxes <WH7776>, and took <WH3947> <WH8799> firebrands <WH3940>, and turned <WH6437> <WH8686> tail <WH2180> to tail <WH2180>, and put <WH7760> <WH8799> a <WH259> firebrand <WH3940> in the midst <WH8432> between two <WH8147> tails <WH2180>.

And when he had set <WH1197> <WH8686> the brands <WH3940> on fire <WH784>, he let them go <WH7971> <WH8762> into the standing corn <WH7054> of the Philistines <WH6430>, and burnt up <WH1197> <WH8686> both the shocks <WH1430>, and also the standing corn <WH7054>, with the vineyards <WH3754> and olives <WH2132>.

Then the Philistines <WH6430> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Who hath done <WH6213> <WH8804> this? And they answered <WH559> <WH8799>, SHimshon <WH8123>, the son in Torah <WH2860> of the Timnite <WH8554>, because he had taken <WH3947> <WH8804> his wife <WH802>, and given <WH5414> <WH8799> her to his companion <WH4828>. And the Philistines <WH6430> came up <WH5927> <WH8799>, and burnt <WH8313> <WH8799> her and her father <WH1> with fire <WH784>.

And SHimshon <WH8123> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Though <WH518> ye have done <WH6213> <WH8799> this <WH2063>, yet will I be avenged <WH5358> <WH8738> of you, and after <WH310> that I will cease <WH2308> <WH8799>.

And he smote <WH5221> <WH8686> them hip <WH7785> and <WH5921> thigh <WH3409> with a great <WH1419> slaughter <WH4347>: and he went down <WH3381> <WH8799> and dwelt <WH3427> <WH8799> in the top <WH5585> of the rock <WH5553> Etam <WH5862>.
Then the Philistines <WH6430> went up <WH5927> <WH8799>, and pitched <WH2583> <WH8799> in Y'hudah <WH3063>, and spread <WH5203> <WH8735> themselves in Lehi <WH3896>.

And the men <WH376> of Y'hudah <WH3063> said <WH559> <WH8799>, Why are ye come up <WH5927> <WH8804> against us? And they answered <WH559> <WH8799>, To bind <WH631> <WH8800> SHimshon <WH8123> are we come up <WH5927> <WH8804>, to do <WH6213> <WH8800> to him as he hath done <WH6213> <WH8804> to us.

Then three <WH7969> thousand <WH505> men <WH376> of Y'hudah <WH3063> went <WH3381> <WH8799> to the top <WH5585> of the rock <WH5553> Etam <WH5862>, and said <WH559> <WH8799> to SHimshon <WH8123>, Knowest <WH3045> <WH8804> thou not that the Philistines <WH6430> are rulers <WH4910> <WH8802> over us? what is this that thou hast done <WH6213> <WH8804> unto us? And he said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, As they did <WH6213> <WH8804> unto me, so have I done <WH6213> <WH8804> unto them.

And they said <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, We are come down <WH3381> <WH8804> to bind <WH631> <WH8800> thee, that we may deliver <WH5414> <WH8800> thee into the hand <WH3027> of the Philistines <WH6430>. And SHimshon <WH8123> said <WH559> <WH8799> unto them, Swear <WH7650> <WH8734> unto me, that ye will not fall upon <WH6293> <WH8799> me yourselves.

And they spake <WH559> <WH8799> unto him, saying <WH559> <WH8800>, No; but we will bind <WH631> <WH8799> thee fast <WH631> <WH8800>, and deliver <WH5414> <WH8804> thee into their hand <WH3027>: but surely <WH4191> <WH8687> we will not kill <WH4191> <WH8686> thee. And they bound <WH631> <WH8799> him with two <WH8147> new <WH2319> cords <WH5688>, and brought him up <WH5927> <WH8686> from the rock <WH5553>.

And when he came <WH935> <WH8804> unto Lehi <WH3896>, the Philistines <WH6430> shouted <WH7321> <WH8689> against <WH7125> <WH8800> him: and the Spirit <WH7307> of the YY <WH3068> came mightily <WH6743> <WH8799> upon him, and the cords <WH5688> that were upon his arms <WH2220> became as flax <WH6593> that was burnt <WH1197> <WH8804> with fire <WH784>, and his bands <WH612> loosed <WH4549> <WH8735> from off his hands <WH3027>.

And he found <WH4672> <WH8799> a new <WH2961> jawbone <WH3895> of an ass <WH2543>, and put forth <WH7971> <WH8799> his hand <WH3027>, and took <WH3947> <WH8799> it, and slew <WH5221> <WH8686> a thousand <WH505> men <WH376> therewith.

And SHimshon <WH8123> said <WH559> <WH8799>, With the jawbone <WH3895> of an ass <WH2543>, heaps <WH2565> upon heaps <WH2565>, with the jaw <WH3895> of an ass <WH2543> have I slain <WH5221> <WH8689> a thousand <WH505> men <WH376>.

And it came to pass, when he had made an end <WH3615> <WH8763> of speaking <WH1696> <WH8763>, that he cast away <WH7993> <WH8686> the jawbone <WH3895> out of his hand <WH3027>, and called <WH7121> <WH8799> that place <WH4725> Ramathlehi <WH7437>.

And he was sore <WH3966> athirst <WH6770> <WH8799>, and called <WH7121> <WH8799> on the YY <WH3068>, and said <WH559> <WH8799>, Thou hast given <WH5414> <WH8804> this great <WH1419> deliverance <WH8668> into the hand <WH3027> of thy servant <WH5650>: and now shall I die <WH4191> <WH8799> for thirst <WH6772>, and fall <WH5307> <WH8804> into the hand <WH3027> of the uncircumcised <WH6189> ?

But 'Elohim <WH430> clave <WH1234> <WH8799> an hollow place <WH4388> that was in the jaw <WH3895>, and there came <WH3318> <WH8799> water <WH4325> thereout; and when he had drunk <WH8354> <WH8799>, his spirit <WH7307> came again <WH7725> <WH8799>, and he revived <WH2421> <WH8799>: wherefore he called <WH7121> <WH8802> the name <WH8034> thereof Enhakkore <WH5875>, which is in Lehi <WH3896> unto this day <WH3117>.
And he judged <WH8199> <WH8799> Yisra'EL <WH3478> in the days <WH3117> of the Philistines <WH6430> twenty <WH6242> years <WH8141>.
